chemoreception.notes: As flatworms, Phyllobothriidae likely use chemoreception to detect hosts and navigate their environment, but specific data is lacking.

mechanoreception.notes: As flatworms, Phyllobothriidae likely use mechanoreception to detect changes in pressure and touch, but specific data is lacking.

photoreception.notes: It is unknown if Phyllobothriidae possess photoreceptors. Further research is needed.
